people.name: Kunal Ganjawala
people.description: Kunal Ganjawala  is a popular playback singer whose songs are mostly featured in Hindi and Kannada films.

people.name: Ahilya Rangnekar
people.description: Ahilya Rangnekar  was an Indian politician, a leader of the Communist Party of India  and the member of the Lok Sabha from 1977 to 1980, representing Mumbai North Central parliamentary constituency.

people.name: Swaminarayan
people.description: Swaminarayan , also known as Sahajanand Swami, is the central figure in a modern branch of Hinduism known as Swaminarayan Hinduism.

people.name: Cesar Chavez
people.description: Cesar Chavez  was an American labor leader and civil rights activist who, with Dolores Huerta, co-founded the National Farm Workers Association  in 1962.

people.name: William Mackintire Salter
people.description: William Mackintire Salter  was the author of several books on philosophy and a critical and enduring major classic on Nietzsche.

people.name: Shilpa Sakhlani
people.description: Shilpa Saklani is a television actress and is known for her role as Ganga in the popular soap opera Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi.

people.name: P. Janardhan Reddy
people.description: P.  Janardhan Reddy popularly known as PJR , was an Indian National Congress party leader and labour leader from Andhra Pradesh.

people.name: Ketki Dave
people.description: Ketki Dave  is an Indian actress.  She has starred in over 75 Gujarati films; and notable Hindi films including Aamdani Atthanni Kharcha Rupaiya, Money Hai Toh Honey Hai, Kal Ho Naa Ho, and Hello! Hum Lallan Bol Rahe Hain.

people.name: Savita Prabhune
people.description: Savita Prabhune is an Indian soap opera actress best known for her role of Aai in Ekta Kapoor's Indian soap opera Kkusum & as Sulochana Karanjkar in Ekta Kapoor's Indian Soap Opera Pavitra Rishta.

people.name: Shrikant Yadav
people.description: Shrikant Mohan Yadav is a film actor.  He is known for Marathi films such as Valu , Deool, Ajoba, Ek Hazarachi Note, Highway and the upcoming Jaundya Na Balasaheb.
